methods/attributes

Methods to manage attributes for the `Me` class.

View Source src/methods/attributes.js, line 2

Methods

# static be(attributes, key, value)

Add or update an attribute for the identity.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
attributes Object The attributes object to update.
key string The attribute key (e.g., "name").
value string The attribute value (e.g., "John Doe").

View Source src/methods/attributes.js, line 16

Error

# static getAttributes(attributes) → {Object}

Retrieve all attributes for the identity.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
attributes Object The attributes object to retrieve from.
